value.title: Glaxo’s biology research with novel Cerebras machine shows hardware may change how AI is done
value.excerpt: A novel computer system built by Cerebras Systems of Los Altos, California, is already leading to changes in the way drug giant Glaxo builds large neural nets for drug development.

value.title: Qualcomm's Second-Gen Laptop Chip Isn't Doing Enough to Compete With Apple
value.excerpt: Qualcomm made a big push into the notebook market with its first purpose-built laptop chip—the Snapdragon 8cx. And for 2020, Qualcomm is announcing the Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 which offers new 5G connectivity along with improved AI and security,

value.title: Space is the place for Irish AI chip as PhiSat-1 satellite blasts off
value.excerpt: The PhiSat-1 is the first European satellite carrying out an experiment to demonstrate how onboard deep learning technology can speed up the rate at which observation data is proessed and transmitted back to Earth.

value.title: Qualcomm promises better AI for its next Snapdragon PC chip
value.excerpt: The Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 follows up 2018’s Snapdragon 8cx, and back then the company said the “x” in the name stood for “extreme” power. While the actual performance promises of the Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 don’t seem like a great leap forward,

value.title: Deep Science: Dog detectors, Mars mappers and AI-scrambling sweaters
value.excerpt: Research papers come out at far too rapid a rate for anyone to read them all, especially in the field of machine learning, which now affects (and produces papers in) practically every industry and company.

value.title: GPU company Imagination Technologies to teach students how to design a CPU
value.excerpt: This does not necessarily bring Imagination back to CPU business right now as it yet has to announce any RISC-V products, but rather demonstrates the company’s interests. The course is called “RVfpga: Understanding Computer Architecture” and it includes theoretical and practical materials to help students understand the basics of processor architecture in general as well as modification or RISC-V cores and microarchitectures.

value.title: LG launches 8K OLED TVs with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 30 Series GPU support
value.excerpt: Electronics brand LG has expanded its product portfolio with the launch of a new range of 8K OLED TVs. The company is said to be the first TV manufacturer to commercialize 8K OLED

value.title: MediaTek, Qualcomm intro AI chips for gaming smartphones
value.excerpt: MediaTek and Qualcomm have introduced their new AI-capable mobile SoC chips designed specifically for gaming smartphones - the Helio G95 and Snapdragon 732G respectively.

value.title: Global Edge AI Chips Market 2020 Industry Key Player, Trend and Segmented Data, Demand and Forecast by 2025
value.excerpt: Global Edge AI Chips Market 2020 by Manufacturers, Regions, Type and Application, Forecast to 2025 includes an overview of the basic industry information, business development, market size, and share scenario.

value.title: Intel CIO Says AI Playing a Growing Role in Chipmaker’s Operations
value.excerpt: Intel Corp. Chief Information Officer Archana Deskus says artificial intelligence has become more critical to the semiconductor maker during the coronavirus pandemic.

value.title: NVIDIA Unveils Ampere GeForce RTX 3090, RTX 3080 And RTX 3070 Gaming GPUs, Crushes It Again
value.excerpt: It may be a little presumptuous to make early projections like this but my initial thought is that Ampere is going to be a huge hit among gamers.

value.title: GeForce RTX 3080 is Nvidia’s New Flagship Next-Gen GPU
value.excerpt: The RTX 3080 is said to be up to twice as fast as the original RTX 2080. Built on a custom 8N manufacturing process, it has 28 billion transistors, 8704 CUDA Cores, and a 10 GB GDDR6X VRAM. It was also confirmed that the images showing the curved heatsink and bi-directional fans of the GPU that were leaked earlier in the year are indeed accurate.

value.title: Nvidia Broadcast brings RTX-powered AI to livestreaming video
value.excerpt: Nvidia Broadcast is a new tool that brings together all of the companys RTX AI features for creating video and audio content.

value.title: What’s Hot In AI, According To Training Data Google, IBM, Microsoft Are Buying
value.excerpt: But what’s growing fastest in artificial intelligence? One clue is where the Fortune 50 are placing their AI bets. And one big tell is what they need training data for. “Training data is really the basis for AI,

value.title: AI-enhanced displays are coming to more affordable smartphones
value.excerpt: Pixelworks' i6 display processor boasts AI scene detection to enhance picture quality for more affordable phones.

value.title: MediaTek Helio G95 chip announced for gaming smartphones
value.excerpt: MediaTek today announced its latest gaming-focused chipset, the Helio G95. An upgraded version of the G90T, the new chip is slightly faster in CPU and GPU benchmarks and comes with other new features.

value.title: Israeli AI chip developer Hailo opens doors on Japanese expansion
value.excerpt: Israeli microprocessor developer Hailo sees a path to support and dominate growing Asian AI chip market by establishing new Japanese

value.title: China Is Gunning To Be The World Leader In AI Chips While Restricting Exports
value.excerpt: China has passed the US in AI chip patenting and their brightest star, Cambricon has more than four times as many patents as Nvidia.

value.title: Israeli chip maker Hailo to set up Tokyo unit as demand for AI tech grows
value.excerpt: Hailo, a maker of chips that allows edge devices like smart cameras or smart cars to have artificial intelligence capabilities, said it is setting up a wholly owned subsidiary in Tokyo, Japan. Edge devices are electronic devices that are installed at the edge of networks — the entry point to networks — in products such as autonomous vehicles,

value.title: Nvidia's top GPU has a formidable new AI rival and it's not who you think it is
value.excerpt: Tachyum, the company that plans to kill the CPU and GPU with its universal Prodigy processor, this week shared additional details regarding its upcoming chip.   As it turns out, the new processor will support industry-standard open-source development frameworks for AI applications,

value.title: Elon Musk unveils ‘Fitbit in your skull’ brain chip, demonstrates on pig
value.excerpt: Musk said this could eventually help cure people with conditions like memory loss, hearing loss, paralysis, blindness, brain damage, depression and anxiety.

value.title: TSMC announces its first 3nm AI chip customer – neither Apple nor Huawei
value.excerpt: At TSMC’s 26th Technical Symposium, TSMC officially confirmed that its 5nm and 6nm processes are already in mass production. In addition, the company also announced that

value.title: Latest NVIDIA SHIELD Update Brings AI Upscaling Enhancements And New Features
value.excerpt: Over and above the excellent hardware, NVIDIA has been religious about consistently releasing updates for the SHIELD TV that only make what was already a great device even better.

value.title: This tiny AI chip obliterates Google rival in a crucial metric
value.excerpt: Kneron, a startup from California, has introduced its new neural processing unit (NPU) for edge AI applications. The KL720 NPU promises to enable sophisticated AI-enhanced applications that do not use the cloud,

value.title: Qualcomm-backed firm releases processor as AI chip race heats up
value.excerpt: Kneron Inc, a semiconductor startup backed by venture capital arms of Qualcomm Inc and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd, on Thursday announced a new chip aimed at handling artificial intelligence functions on battery-powered devices.

value.title: Kneron launches its new AI chip to challenge Google and others

value.title: ProteanTecs raises $45 million to apply AI to chip design and performance monitoring
value.excerpt: Startup ProteanTecs raised $45 million to further develop its AI chip design platform, bringing its total raised to nearly $100 million.

value.title: DDN Recognized for Innovation in Artificial Intelligence Data Management with 2020 AI Breakthrough Award

value.title: Baidu Is Searching For Quantum AI Advantage
value.excerpt: Baidu, China’s leading search engine and AI powerhouse, recently announced Paddle Quantum, a quantum machine learning development toolkit. This was the latest in a series of steps Baidu has taken to marry quantum computing with AI since establishing its Institute for Quantum Computing in 2018.
